attributes.action: Schools will stay shut over there summer holidays.
attributes.additional_details: Because the younger population have already been facing a lot of stress with how schooling has been this year. And the younger population needs a break for their mental health.
attributes.background: To NOT go ahead with the government plans for the project to stay open on the summer holidays.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585
